name: 網路行銷
description:
網路嚴重影響了我們的生活方式和彼此之間的溝通。電子郵件，博客，網站，社交媒體和支持網路的移動設備等現象現已融入我們的日常生活中，如果沒有它們，我們幾乎無法生存。網路也改變了公司與客戶，員工，貿易夥伴和社區其他成員開展業務和溝通的方式。這些變化為組織提供了令人興奮的挑戰和機遇，行銷人員可以利用這些挑戰和機會幫助他們的組織取得成功。本課程以如何展開網路數位行銷計劃為主軸，並將傳統行銷管理的思想和原則貫穿其中。除以講授觀念與個案外，同時也加入同學的分組討論與實作。因此主要目標如下︰
1. 瞭解網路數位匯流對行銷理論的意義。
2. 學習網路數位匯流科技在當代行銷事務的應用。
3. 同學從數位傳播、行銷、與民眾的角度觀摩相關概念和實例，並研討傑出的數位網路行銷個案，以為借鏡。
4. 並且要求學生從做中學，企劃並執行網路數位行銷專案。
goals: Apply basic marketing principles to the Internet environment
Recognize and discuss the challenges and opportunities that the Internet and other digital technologies present to marketers
Understand and explain key material and concepts related to Internet marketing through readings and class discussion
Show effective communication skills (verbal and written) through an in class presentation and online communications
Exhibit the ability to work effectively in team activities
Gain preparation to thrive in a professional environment in which the Internet and other digital technologies will play crucial roles in your career

1\. Course Introduction

3\. Strategic E-Marketing and Performance Metrics

4\. The E-Marketing Plan

6\. Global E-Marketing 3.0 and Ethical and Legal Issues

8\. E-Marketing Research and Consumer Behavior Online

9. Case Study 2

10\. Segmentation, Targeting, Differentiation, and Positioning Strategies

11\. Case Study 3

12\. Product: The Online Offer & Price: The Online Value

13\. The Internet for Distribution

14\. Case Study 4

15\. E-Marketing Communication: Owned, Paid, and Earned Media

16\. Customer Relationship Management

17\. Final Report

18\. Final Report

methodologies.note: Explain the contents of the textbook and corporate cases studies.
Propose practical issues and discuss possible solutions
Finish case studies and final reports through team discussions
Plan and execute a real internet marketing proposal

grading.note: The feasibility of the internet marketing proposal
The performance of the internet marketing proposal
